CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(EUD_ImportReason__c), "Are these parts PROTOTYPE or PRODUCTION: " + BR() + BR(), "") + IF(NOT(EUD_PartDescription__c), "What is the end use of the part?" + BR() + BR() + "End-Use Examples: Aluminum fixture prototype for tension control assembly / Pump for a medical device to measure blood pressure / Main body component for consumer handheld camera assembly" + BR() + BR() + "Add end-use description here:" + BR() + BR(), "") + IF(NOT(EUD_Industry__c), "What industry is the part being used for? (i.e. medical, aerospace, industrial): " + BR() + BR(), "") + IF(NOT(EUD_HTSCode__c), "Please include the HTS code to classify your PRODUCTION PARTS. This is NECESSARY for customs." + BR() + "If you do not know what your HTS code is, please use the US customs web page to locate your HTS code (https://hts.usitc.gov/)." + BR() + BR() + "Add HTS Code here (production parts only): " + BR() +BR() +"Here are some links that you might find useful:"+ BR() + "https://www.trade.gov/harmonized-system-hs-codes" +BR() + "Harmonized System (HS) Codes" + "- Official Website of the International Trade Administration"+BR() + "https://hts.usitc.gov/" +BR()+"HTS Code Finder" + "- Learn about the Harmonized System standardized numerical method of classifying traded products. used by customs authorities around the world to assess duties." + BR(), "")
CustomField.label: [EUD] Email Template Helper
